  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout 

    public class SettingsTabbedPane
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Container
    Created by Patrick Windegger on 21.03.2017. Class responsible for providing a TabbedPane for the 3 different settings (Video, Audio, Input) SettingsScreen
